statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, readmission_status FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE readmission_status = 'Yes' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age >= 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND readmission_status = 'Yes';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, readmission_status FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(*) AS diagnosis_count FROM patients GROUP BY diagnosis HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, readmission_status FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 60;
SELECT diagnosis, patient_name FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT * FROM readmissions JOIN patients ON readmissions.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, readmission_date, reason FROM patients JOIN readmissions ON patients.patient_id = readmissions.patient_id WHERE readmission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE last_visit < '2021-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT p.patient_name, r.reason FROM patients p INNER JOIN readmissions r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id
SELECT * FROM patients p LEFT JOIN readmissions r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.reason IS NULL
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS admission_count FROM Admissions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Admissions ON Patients.patient_id = Admissions.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM Admissions;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Admissions.admission_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Admissions ON Patients.patient_id = Admissions.patient_id ORDER BY Admissions.admission_date DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Admissions.admission_date, Readmissions.readmission_date FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Admissions ON Patients.patient_id = Admissions.patient_id LEFT JOIN Readmissions ON Patients.patient_id = Readmissions.patient_id WHERE Admissions.admission_date < '2021-01-01' AND Readmissions.readmission_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 40;
SELECT * FROM Admissions ORDER BY discharge_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' AND admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_readmissions FROM Readmissions;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT admission_date, discharge_date, discharge_reason FROM Admissions WHERE admission_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT patient_name, readmission_date, readmission_reason FROM Patients JOIN Readmissions ON Patients.patient_id = Readmissions.patient_id WHERE Patients.patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT MAX(patient_age) AS max_age, MIN(patient_age) AS min_age, AVG(patient_age) AS avg_age FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Diagnoses WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT lab_test, lab_result, test_date FROM Labs ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND admission_date <= '2022-06-30';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Diagnoses.diagnosis, Diagnoses.diagnosis_date FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id WHERE Diagnoses.diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%' ORDER BY Diagnoses.diagnosis_date ASC;

SELECT Medications.medication_name, Medications.dosage, Patients.patient_name FROM Medications INNER JOIN Patients ON Medications.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE start_date <= '2022-07-01' AND end_date >= '2022-07-01';

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_readmissions FROM Patients JOIN Readmissions ON Patients.patient_id = Readmissions.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_id HAVING num_readmissions > 1 ORDER BY num_readmissions DESC;
